Class UserRepo

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.repositories.UserRepo
All Implemented Interfaces:
RepoInterface<UserModel,Integer>
public class UserRepo extends Object implements RepoInterface<UserModel,Integer>
Manages the storage and retrieval of user data (UserModel and its subclasses). Implements the RepoInterface for standard repository operations and adds user-specific finders.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private List<UserModel>
    users
    In-memory list to store all user instances.

  • Constructor Summary

    UserRepo()
    Constructs a UserRepo, initializing an empty list to hold users.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserRepo

      public UserRepo()
      Constructs a UserRepo, initializing an empty list to hold users.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save(UserModel user) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Saves a new user to the repository. Checks for existing users with the same NRIC or User ID before adding.
      Specified by:
      save in interface RepoInterface<UserModel,Integer>
      Parameters:
      user - The UserModel object to save.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a user with the same NRIC or User ID already exists.

    • findAll

      public List<UserModel> findAll()
      Retrieves a list of all users currently stored in the repository.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface RepoInterface<UserModel,Integer>
      Returns:
      A new ArrayList containing all UserModel objects.

    • findByID

      public UserModel findByID(Integer userID)
      Finds a user by their unique User ID. Delegates to the getUserByUserID method.
      Specified by:
      findByID in interface RepoInterface<UserModel,Integer>
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The found UserModel object, or null if no user matches the ID.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(Integer userID)
      Deletes a user from the repository based on their unique User ID.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface RepoInterface<UserModel,Integer>
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the user was found and deleted, false otherwise.

    • getUserByNRIC

      public UserModel getUserByNRIC(String nric)
      Finds a user by their NRIC number. Iterates through the list to find a match.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC number of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The found UserModel object, or null if no user matches the NRIC.

    • getUserByName

      public UserModel getUserByName(String name)
      Finds a user by their full name. Iterates through the list to find the first match. Note: Names may not be unique.
      Parameters:
      name - The full name of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The first found UserModel object with the matching name, or null if no user matches.

    • getUserByUserID

      public UserModel getUserByUserID(int UserID)
      Finds a user by their unique User ID. Iterates through the list to find a match.
      Parameters:
      UserID - The ID of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The found UserModel object, or null if no user matches the ID.
